block.p: Allison Reeve Lister, the daughter of Joan Gibson Lister of New Canaan, Conn., and Stephen A. Lister of New York, was married yesterday to Henry Boeckmann III, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Boeckmann Jr. of West Islip, N.Y. The Rev. Lidabell Lunt Pollard performed the ceremony at the Congregational Church in New Canaan.

Mrs. Boeckmann, 28, is a program director in New York for the Economist Group and plans conferences on Latin American business and government. She graduated from Lafayette College. Her mother is a sales consultant in New Canaan for the Carlisle Collection, a women's clothing company. Her father, who is retired, was the president of the Asia-Pacific region of the Colgate Palmolive Company.

Allison Reeve Lister, the daughter of Joan Gibson Lister of New Canaan, Conn., and Stephen A. Lister of New York, was married yesterday to Henry Boeckmann III, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Boeckmann Jr. of West Islip, N.Y. The Rev. Lidabell Lunt Pollard performed the ceremony at the Congregational Church in New Canaan.

Mrs. Boeckmann, 28, is a program director in New York for the Economist Group and plans conferences on Latin American business and government. She graduated from Lafayette College. Her mother is a sales consultant in New Canaan for the Carlisle Collection, a women's clothing company. Her father, who is retired, was the president of the Asia-Pacific region of the Colgate Palmolive Company.
Mr. Boeckmann, 29, is the owner of Henry Boeckmann & Associates, a real estate appraisal and consulting firm started by his father. The bridegroom graduated from Bowdoin College.
